title: The Blood Medley Victory in Jesus  Are You Washed in the Blood  Nothing but the Blood of Jesus  Power in the Blood
lyrics:
O victory in Jesus
My Savior, forever
He sought me and bought me
With His redeeming blood
Have you been to Jesus for the cleansing power?

Are you washed in the blood of the Lamb?

Are you fully trusting in His grace this hour?

Are you washed in the blood of the Lamb? (Come on!)



Are you washed (are you washed) in the blood (in the blood)

In the soul-cleansing blood of the Lamb?

Are your garments spotless? Are they white as snow?

Are you washed in the blood of the Lamb?



What can wash away my sin?

Nothing but the blood of Jesus

What can make me whole again?

Nothing but the blood of Jesus



There is power, power, wonder-working power

In the blood (in the blood) of the Lamb (of the Lamb)

There is power, power, wonder-working power

In the precious blood of the Lamb



Oh! precious is the flow

That makes me white as snow

No other fount I know

Nothing but the blood of Jesus

So, nothing but the blood of Jesus



Are you washed in the blood

In the blood of the Lamb?

He sought me and bought me

There's nothing but the blood of Jesus
